subject: Baseball
Little League World Series
lead_paragraph: Japan overcame an eight-run first-inning deficit against Lewisberry, Pa., as the teams broke the Little League World Series championship game record of 23 combined runs — by the fourth inning.
snippet: Japan overcame an eight-run first-inning deficit against Lewisberry, Pa., as the teams broke the Little League World Series championship game record of 23 combined runs — by the fourth inning.
